data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lu, Xiumei, Xia, Fangyuan, Wang, Bo, Aspöck, Ulrike, Liu, Xingyue (2018): Taxonomic notes on Cretarophalis patrickMUelleri Wichard, 2017 (Insecta: Neuroptera: Nevrorthidae) from the mid-Cretaceous of Myanmar, and its phylogenetic significance. Zootaxa 4370 (5): 591-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.5.10
